name: CY-VIBER (Pre-alpha)
description:
--Description--

Cy-viber is a survival game for rounds, in which the enemies get stronger and stronger, with a total of 6 different enemies that will appear throughout the game (more to come).

You will have at your disposal 6 special abilities:

Explosive

Engineer

Tesla rocket

Sharp Art

Distraction

Temporal Control

(more coming soon).

Each skill is divided into 2 different abilities.

--Controls--

"W" to jump

"A" and "D" to move

"S" to fall faster

"E" to interact with objects on the map

Left Click for normal attack

Right Click for Primary ability

"Q" for secondary ability

"ESC" for pause

In case of finding a bug, please report it, thanks :)
